@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: express
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function take care of starting a frontend express based server

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: doc
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function is responsible of responding to express requests made on the doc pages

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: docMap
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function is responsible of responding to express requests made on the docMap url

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: index
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function is responsible of responding to express requests made on the index pages

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: markdown
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function is responsible of responding to express requests made on the doc pages

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.node.int.name: SFrontendServerStartParamsInterface
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.node.int.description:
This class represent the interface that describe the minimum requirement
needed for a frontend server process.

logLevel.description: Specify the log level you want for your server

prod.description: Specify that we want the server to act "like" a production one with compression etc...

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: benchEndMiddleware
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: SMall middleware to end the request benchmark

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: envMiddleware
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function describe the middleware that will add the "env" property to the ```res.templateData``` object

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: packageJsonMiddleware
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description:
This function describe the middleware that will fetch the ```package.json``` file at the root of
your server directory and add it to the template data sended to the rendered view

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: requestMiddleware
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description:
This function describe the middleware will fill the templateData.request object with the
actual express one

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: resolveExtensionFreePath
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function will try to resolve extension free requests like node modules, etc...

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: apiHandler
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function is responsible of responding to express requests made on the api pages

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: configMiddleware
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function describe the middleware that will expose the config and config files add it to the template data sended to the rendered view

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: docmapMiddleware
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description:
This function describe the middleware that will fetch the ```docmap.json``` file at the root of
your server directory and add it to the template data sended to the rendered view

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: frontspecMiddleware
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description:
This function describe the middleware that will fetch the ```frontspec.json``` file at the root of
your server directory and add it to the template data sended to the rendered view

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: styleguideHandler
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description: This function is responsible of responding to express requests made on the doc pages

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.node.mod.name: views
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.node.mod.description: This function is responsible of responding to express requests made on the "views" section

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.name: error
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.sugar.no.description:
This function simply return the 404 page content to send to the user
with the passed data object described here:

@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.s-fronte.name: SFrontendServer
@coffeekraken.s-frontend-server.s-fronte.description:
This class represent a frontend server that handle features like documentation, views rendering,
frontspec reading middleware, packageJson middleware and more...

start.name: start
start.description:
This function take as parameter an Partial<ISFrontendServerParams> object,
start a server using these parameters and returns an SPromise instance
through which you can subscribe for events, etc...
